SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

sndlib.core.io
Class SNDlibIOFormat

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.io.SNDlibIOFormat

public class SNDlibIOFormat
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a SNDlib IO format.

The available formats and their properties are defined in the property file named sndlib.io.formats.properties, which is contained in the package of this class.

The format definitions in the property file mentioned above can be expanded resp. overridden by providing a property file with the same name located on the classpath (not in this class's package).

The format of the property file is intentionally simple. An entry looks like:

<format>.<property>=<value>

The available properties are parserClass, writerClass and fileExtension. The values for the former are the fully qualified names of the classes implementing the SNDlibParser resp. SNDlibWriter interfaces. The latter specifies the common filename extension to be used when writing files in that format.

Author:
Roman Klaehne

Method Detail

valueOf

public static SNDlibIOFormat valueOf(java.lang.String format)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Returns the IO format corresponding to the specified name.

This method first searches for the specified format in a property file named sndlib.io.formats.properties. If that property file does not exist or does not contain the definition of the specified format this method looks in the default property file contained in the package of this class.

Parameters:
format - the name of the format to be returned
Returns:
the IO format corresponding to the specified name
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified format is unknown

hasFormat

public static boolean hasFormat(java.lang.String format)
Tests whether there is an IO format with the specified name.

Parameters:
format - the name of the format
Returns:
true if and only if there is a format with the specified name; false otherwise

getParserClassName

public java.lang.String getParserClassName()
Returns the class name of the SNDlibParser implementation handling this format.

Returns:
the class name of the SNDlibParser implementation handling this format

getWriterClassName

public java.lang.String getWriterClassName()
Returns the class name of the SNDlibWriter implementation handling this format.

Returns:
the class name of the SNDlibWriter implementation handling this format

getFileExtension

public java.lang.String getFileExtension()
Returns the common filename extension to be used when writing files in this format. If no filename extension is specified this method returns unknown.

Returns:
the common filename extension to be used when writing files in this format; unknown if no filename extension is specified

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Returns the name of this format.

Returns:
the name of this format
